瀤字的基本解释

瀤
huái
北方水名。

瀤
wāi
〔溛瀤〕见“

瀤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《廣韻》户乖切，平皆，匣。］
见“瀤澤”。
[②]［wāi］
［《集韻》烏乖切，平皆，影。］
见“溛瀤”。

瀤字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀤； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页660第16
【唐韻】戸乖切，音懷。【說文】北方水也。【山海經】獄法之山，瀤澤之水出焉。　又【集韻】烏乖切，音崴。溛瀤，水不平貌。【郭璞·江賦】峾淪溛瀤。

瀤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瀤字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
["Guangyun" households are obediently cut, flat, boxed. ]
See "Yunze".
[②]［wāi］
["Ji Yun" Wu is cut, flat, and shadow. ]
See "Xin Ying".
瀤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　瀤; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 660 Chapter 16
[Tang Yun] Be obedient and cut, and sound. [Said the text] Northern water is also. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of prison law, the water of Yanze flows out of Yan.　[Jiyun] Wu Guai cut, sound wai. Xiao Ying, the water is uneven. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] De Lun Ying.
